publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-152 Margo MacDonald: Ability of Holyrood Progress Group—That the Parliament has no confidence in the ability of the Holyrood Progress Group to achieve any of its aims, which are to deal competently with question and answer sessions for MSPs, monitor and report on the progress of the Holyrood project and control expenditure, and resolves to exert a greater measure of client control over the project by appointing an experienced building industry professional to represent the Parliament and the public interest on the Holyrood Project Team in place of the current project director.
